attributes.action: DELAY UNTIL PEOPLE CAN AFFORD TO BUY NEW EQUIPMENT
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I LIVE IN THE NWEST OF ENGLAND AND OUR DIGITAL SWITCH OVER IS NOVEMBER 2009. I DID NOT REALISE WHAT WAS INVOLVED UNTIL MY PARTNER FULLY EXPLAINED IT TO ME, I AM SURE I AM NOT ALONE IN THIS. WE HAVE TO REPLACE NOT ONLY OUR TV BUT DVD AND VIDEO RECORDER WHICH WILL BE VERY EXPENSIVE IN NORMAL TIMES BUT IN THIS CLIMATE THESE ARE ALL LUXURY ITEMS. PLEASE CONSIDER A DELAY IF POSSIBLE OR SOME SORT OF HELP. DENISE

rejection.details: Title needs to be clearer about the issue - ie switchover to digital TV.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
